title: No-Bake Oreo Pie
directions: Crush 25 oreos finely in food processor and combine with melted butter to form the crust.
Press the oreo crust mixture firmly and evenly into a bottom of a 8 or 9 inch pie dish.
Mix cream cheese, cool whip, powdered sugar in a separate bowl until smooth.
Mix half of the cream cheese mixture with 8 crushed oreos, and the other half with melted chocolate.
Spread the oreo cream cheese layer on top of the oreo crust evenly, then top with 7 oreos, and spread the chocolate cream cheese mixture on top.
Sprinkle with the last of the crushed oreos, and refrigerate for 2+ hours. The longer the better!
Slice and serve with a nice glass of milk grin emoticon
